data.lyric:
[ti:A Million Dreams]
[ar:P!NK]
[al:A Million Dreams]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]A Million Dreams - P!NK (红粉佳人)
[00:04.38]Lyrics by：Justin Paul/Benj Paskek
[00:08.77]Arranged by：Rob Mathes
[00:13.16]Produced by：Justin Paul/Greg Wells/Joseph Trapanese/Alex Lacamoire
[00:17.55]I close my eyes and I can see
[00:20.72]A world that's waiting up for me
[00:24.49]That I call my own
[00:30.61]Through the dark through the door
[00:33.85]Through where no one's been before
[00:37.42]But it feels like home
[00:43.10]They can say they can say it all sounds crazy
[00:49.56]They can say they can say I've lost my mind
[00:56.12]I don't care I don't care so call me crazy
[01:02.37]We can live in a world that we design
[01:08.53]'Cause every night I lie in bed
[01:11.68]The brightest colors fill my head
[01:14.90]A million dreams are keeping me awake
[01:21.44]I think of what the world could be
[01:24.62]A vision of the one I see
[01:27.96]A million dreams is all it's gonna take
[01:34.37]A million dreams for the world we're gonna make
[01:45.11]There's a house we can build
[01:48.35]Every room inside is filled
[01:52.20]With things from far away
[01:57.97]Special things I compile
[02:01.17]Each one there to make you smile
[02:05.08]On a rainy day
[02:10.65]They can say they can say it all sounds crazy
[02:17.22]They can say they can say we've lost our minds
[02:23.62]I don't care I don't care if they call us crazy
[02:29.94]Runaway to a world that we design
[02:36.06]Every night I lie in bed
[02:39.29]The brightest colors fill my head
[02:42.41]A million dreams are keeping me awake
[02:48.99]I think of what the world could be
[02:52.19]A vision of the one I see
[02:55.41]A million dreams is all it's gonna take
[03:01.86]Oh a million dreams for the world we're gonna make
[03:06.11]However big however small
[03:09.47]Let me be part of it all
[03:13.45]Share your dreams with me
[03:19.00]We may be right we may be wrong
[03:22.29]But I wanna bring you along
[03:26.08]To the world I see
[03:29.26]To the world we close our eyes to see
[03:33.54]We close our eyes to see
[03:39.54]Every night I lie in bed
[03:42.50]The brightest colors fill my head
[03:45.72]A million dreams are keeping me awake
[03:52.32]I think of what the world could be
[03:55.35]A vision of the one I see
[03:58.74]A million dreams is all it's gonna take
[04:05.26]A million dreams for the world we're gonna make
[04:16.31]For the world we're gonna make
data.trans:
[ti:A Million Dreams]
[ar:P!NK]
[al:A Million Dreams]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.38]//
[00:08.77]//
[00:13.16]//
[00:17.55]我闭上眼睛 用心感受
[00:20.72]有个世界正期待我的出现
[00:24.49]那是属于我的地方
[00:30.61]穿过茫茫黑暗 穿过那扇门
[00:33.85]穿过荒无人烟的世界
[00:37.42]却感觉像家一般温暖
[00:43.10]他们可以说 可以说这听起来多么疯狂
[00:49.56]他们可以说 可以说我已经丧失理智
[00:56.12]我不在乎 我不在乎 就当我是疯了吧
[01:02.37]我们可以生活在自己创造的世界里
[01:08.53]因为每晚我躺在床上
[01:11.68]脑海中满是缤纷的思绪
[01:14.90]无数梦想让我浮想联翩
[01:21.44]我在想这世界会变成什么样
[01:24.62]我将会看到怎样精彩的世界
[01:27.96]无数梦想将会组成这一切
[01:34.37]我们创造的世界将会由无数梦想编织而成
[01:45.11]我们创建的家园
[01:48.35]每个房间都满载
[01:52.20]那遥不可及的梦
[01:57.97]我所编织的美好
[02:01.17]是那么的不可思议 让你展露笑颜
[02:05.08]即便是阴雨绵绵的日子
[02:10.65]他们可以说 可以说这听起来多么疯狂
[02:17.22]他们可以说 可以说我已经丧失理智
[02:23.62]我不在乎 我不在乎 就当我是疯了吧
[02:29.94]逃离去往我们创造的世界吧
[02:36.06]每晚我躺在床上
[02:39.29]脑海中满是缤纷的思绪
[02:42.41]无数梦想让我浮想联翩
[02:48.99]我在想这世界会变成什么样
[02:52.19]我将会看到怎样精彩的世界
[02:55.41]无数梦想将会组成这一切
[03:01.86]我们创造的世界将会由无数梦想编织而成
[03:06.11]不管梦想是大是小
[03:09.47]让我们全都参与其中
[03:13.45]和我分享你的梦想吧
[03:19.00]你可能是对的 也可能是错的
[03:22.29]但你会与我携手一同前往
[03:26.08]去往你向往的世界
[03:29.26]去往向往的世界 我闭上眼睛 用心感受
[03:33.54]我闭上眼睛 用心感受
[03:39.54]每晚我躺在床上
[03:42.50]脑海中满是缤纷的思绪
[03:45.72]无数梦想让我浮想联翩
[03:52.32]我在想这世界会变成什么样
[03:55.35]我将会看到怎样精彩的世界
[03:58.74]无数梦想将会组成这一切
[04:05.26]我们创造的世界将会由无数梦想编织而成
[04:16.31]我们创造的世界
